attributes.action: Deny Mr Graham Badman any future official employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition was refused twice on the basis that it contained potentially libellous, false or defamatory comments.  Therefore, I must point potential signatories in the direction of the Badman Review of Elective Home Education and ask them to consider whether the author is an appropriate and suitable person for any future government employment.  Potential signatories will therefore come to their own conclusions without my apparently pernicious influence.

rejection.details: There is no legal basis for your petition, and therefore we have had to reject it.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
